name: Wikipedia- Green text & white borders on black
description: Based on http://userstyles.org/styles/751, but I changed the text colors to shades of green. Re-live the phosphorescent monochrome era. (ONLY tested with the Stylish addon on Firefox!)
additional_info: Updated to unbreak mathematical formulae with recent changes to Wikipedia's document structure. I found that the HTML was now hiding the actual MathML and instead relying on SVGs in the background-image, which were then being overridden by my changes to background-color. I fixed this by hiding the SVGs and showing the MathML instead.
